fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
JRAIA carries out the activities to promote and improve production, distribution and utilization of refrigerating machines, refrigerating machine appliances and equipment, as well as auxiliary devices and components, automatic controls and accessories (hereinafter referred to as ''refrigeration/air conditioning equipment''), and thereby contribute to the steady development of Japanese industry and improvement in people's quality of life.   
  
Europe takes leading role of environmental regulations in the world, so air conditioners are also in the scope of such advanced environmental regulations. In order to get timely regulatory information of EU and supply sufficient technical information of Japan, JROAME was established in Brussels.
organisation_name: The Japan Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Industry Association (JRAIA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Consultation Forum according to Art. 23 of Regulation (EU) No 517/2014 on fluorinated greenhouse gases#X03338#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3338#Member#C
membership:
EPEE: JRAIA is associate member of EPEE. Major JRAIA companies are also member of EPEE, but most of them do not have technical representation in Europe. So, JRAIA sometimes provides consolidated technical opinions of member companies of JRAIA for EPEE. 
 
JBCE: Most of major JRAIA member companies in Europe are member of JBCE. JBCE has air conditioning WG to discuss these issues. JRAIA representatives attend such meeting. 
 
ICARHMA:    ICARHMA is council of Refrigeration, air conditioning and heating industry associations of countries in the world. AHRI of the USA is secretary. JRAIA is one of key members. Current members are AHRI(USA), HRAI(Canada), EUROVENT and EPEE(Europe), ABRAVA(Brazil), CRAA(China), KRAIA(South Korea), AREMA(Australia), RAMA(India), ACAIRE(Colombia) and JRAIA 
 
EUROVENT: Some of JRAIA members are also member of EUROVENT. As EUROVENT is the counter part of JRAIA in EU, so mutual collaborating relationship is provided in some extent.
goals__remit:
JRAIA aims to promote and improve production, distribution and utilization of refrigerating machines, refrigerating machine appliances and equipment, as well as auxiliary devices and components, automatic controls and accessories (hereinafter referred to as ''refrigeration/air conditioning equipment''), and thereby contribute to the steady development of Japanese industry and improvement in people's quality of life. 
 
Japanese residential and commercial air conditioners are major in Europe. As mild summer climate in Europe had been requiring limited air conditioning, the air conditioning industry in Europe has not fully developed yet. Thus, large portion of air conditioning products and technologies in Europe is depending on Japanese technologies.   
  
Europe takes leading role of environmental regulations in the world, so air conditioners are also in the scope of such advanced environmental regulations. In order to get timely regulatory information of EU and supply sufficient technical information of Japan, JROAME was established in Brussels.
position: Senior manager, International Affairs Dpt.(Secretary General JROAME)
